message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe would be very valuable to you.  I'm asking $12,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $9,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about $11,000?  I'm confident this product will be well worth it to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
